message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing an initial offer of $1,500,000.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product is significant to you, but given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $900,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but the value of this product to me is significantly higher. I'm willing to negotiate, but I can't go below $1,300,000. This is a very competitive price for what you're getting.

I understand your position, Alice. While I respect the value you place on the product, I am still committed to staying within my budget. I would like to counter with an offer of $1,200,000. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you're considering.
